**Hi!**

We are starting to sell OpenVZ based VPS, we have plans with pure SSD disk and SSD Cached disks. For this event, we created a **LTALK-VZ** coudon code, which provide 30% discount from our VPS prices (including our Xen plans).

We don't suspend VPS, if you reach bandwith limit, simply asking why reached it.

----------

SSD-Cached plans
---------------
Servers have a below detailed parameters:

 - CPU: AMD Opteron 4226
 - SSD Cache: Samsung SSD 840 EVO (flashcache)
 - HDD: SATA RAID5
 - 1 GBit/s internet connection
 - Location: Budapest, Hungary; [Kozma DC][1]
 - Test file: http://test2.mikrovps.hu/100mb.test
